EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_NYC_OpenHouse_Q413.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: The NYC Pivotal Open House is tonight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're Looking Forward to You Joining Us. Hey {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We're happy you can come celebrate our new facility (and East Coast headquarters) this evening! We are proud of the unique collaborative work environment we’ve created and can’t wait for you to check it out. Event Details: Date: Thursday, October 3 Time: 6-9pm Location: Pivotal HQ, 625 Avenue of the Americas, 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011 <https://maps.google.com/maps?q=625+avenue+of+the+americas&hnear=625+Avenue+of+the+Americas,+New+York,+10011&gl=us&t=m&z=16>
Questions? Contact Us <mailto:info@gopivotal.com>. Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
